examples.example: 我为这次考试准备了十足的精力，相信一定能取得好成绩。

translate.english: I have prepared full energy for this exam and believe that I will definitely get good grades.

examples.example: 我十分期待这次旅行，相信一定会非常精彩。

translate.english: I am very much looking forward to this trip and believe it will be extremely wonderful.

examples.example: 我们的团队有十足的信心完成这项艰巨的任务。

translate.english: Our team has full confidence to complete this arduous task.
